name: Table's Advantage
description:
A bullet hell style game where you play as a D&D figurine that is out to destroy all the dice that critically failed him. 

CONTROLS: WASD to move, Lclick to shoot

In 2 days we were able to create multiple dice enemy types, automatic level building, an item shop with upgrades and an inventory system. A currency system was partially implemented but is not fully there. Bosses were also planned.

- shop is in bottom left corner; dice scale danger level by their roll

MadeBy: M_Katarn, xtr3m3nerd, theionkid
